alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:08PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Nye and west central White Pine Counties through 345 PM PDT... At 307 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles north of Duckwater, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Nye and west central White Pine Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; White Pine County
